#!/bin/bash
# Enhanced Database Backup Tool Installation mit vollst√§ndigen Security Features

set -e

declare -r DIR="/mnt/server"
declare -r APP_DIR="${DIR}/db-backup-tool"

# Fest definiertes Repository
REPO_URL="https://github.com/brandy2307/db-backup-tool.git"
REPO_BRANCH="main"

echo "================================================="
echo "DB BACKUP TOOL INSTALLATION (Enhanced Security)"
echo "================================================="
echo "Repository: ${REPO_URL}"
echo "Branch: ${REPO_BRANCH}"
echo "Target: ${APP_DIR}"
echo "Features: SSL + 2FA + CAPTCHA + Security"
echo "================================================="

# System Dependencies installieren
echo "[1/8] Installing system dependencies..."
apt update
apt install -y wget curl gnupg2 software-properties-common git openssl ca-certificates lsb-release

# Node.js installieren
echo "[2/8] Installing Node.js 18..."
curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_18.x | bash -
apt install -y nodejs

# Database Tools installieren
echo "[3/8] Installing database tools..."
# MySQL Client
apt install -y mysql-client || apt install -y default-mysql-client || echo "MySQL client installation failed (optional)"

# PostgreSQL Client
apt install -y postgresql-client || apt install -y postgresql-client-common || echo "PostgreSQL client installation failed (optional)"

# MongoDB Tools
echo "Installing MongoDB tools..."
wget -qO - https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-7.0.asc | gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/mongodb-server-7.0.gpg
echo "deb [ arch=amd64,arm64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/mongodb-server-7.0.gpg ] https://repo.mongodb.org/apt/debian $(lsb_release -cs)/mongodb-org/7.0 main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-7.0.list
apt update
apt install -y mongodb-database-tools || echo "MongoDB tools installation failed (optional)"

# SSL/TLS und Security Tools
echo "[4/8] Installing SSL and security tools..."
apt install -y certbot python3-certbot-nginx || echo "Certbot installation failed (optional)"
apt install -y fail2ban || echo "Fail2ban installation failed (optional)"

# Git konfigurieren
echo "[5/8] Configuring Git..."
git config --global init.defaultBranch main
git config --global user.name "DB Backup Tool"
git config --global user.email "backup@localhost"
git config --global http.postBuffer 524288000
git config --global core.compression 0

# Tools verifikation
echo "[6/8] Verifying installed tools..."
echo "Node.js: $(node --version)"
echo "NPM: $(npm --version)"
echo "Git: $(git --version)"
echo "OpenSSL: $(openssl version)"
echo "Certbot: $(certbot --version || echo 'Not available')"

# Wechsel zum Zielverzeichnis
cd "${DIR}"

# Alte Installation entfernen
if [ -d "${APP_DIR}" ]; then
    echo "Removing old installation..."
    rm -rf "${APP_DIR}"
fi

# Repository Setup
echo "[7/8] Setting up official repository..."
echo "Cloning from: ${REPO_URL}"

# Test Repository-Zugriff
if ! git ls-remote --heads "${REPO_URL}" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "ERROR: Repository '${REPO_URL}' is not accessible!"
    echo "Check internet connection and repository availability"
    exit 1
fi

# Repository klonen
echo "Cloning repository..."
if ! git clone -b "${REPO_BRANCH}" "${REPO_URL}" "${APP_DIR}"; then
    echo "ERROR: Git clone failed!"
    echo "This might be a temporary network issue - try reinstalling"
    exit 1
fi

# Verifikation nach Clone
cd "${APP_DIR}"
echo "Repository cloned to: $(pwd)"

# Pr√ºfe kritische Dateien
echo "Verifying critical files..."
CRITICAL_FILES=(
    "package.json"
    "server.js"
    "config.json"
    "public/index.html"
    "public/app.js"
    "public/styles.css"
)

for file in "${CRITICAL_FILES[@]}"; do
    if [ ! -f "$file" ]; then
        echo "ERROR: Critical file missing: $file"
        exit 1
    fi
done

echo "‚úì All critical files found"

# Dependencies installieren mit erweiterten Optionen
echo "[8/8] Installing dependencies..."
npm cache clean --force

# Versuche verschiedene NPM Install-Strategien
if npm install --production --no-audit --no-fund; then
    echo "‚úì Dependencies installed successfully"
elif npm install --production --legacy-peer-deps --no-audit --no-fund; then
    echo "‚úì Dependencies installed with legacy-peer-deps"
elif npm install --production --force --no-audit --no-fund; then
    echo "‚úì Dependencies installed with force flag"
else
    echo "ERROR: Failed to install dependencies"
    echo "This might be due to network issues - try reinstalling"
    exit 1
fi

# Verzeichnisse erstellen mit korrekten Berechtigungen
echo "Creating directories with proper permissions..."
mkdir -p backups logs config public ssl

# Sichere Berechtigungen f√ºr SSL und Backups
chmod 700 ssl
chmod 755 backups logs config public
chmod 755 .

# Erweiterte Konfiguration erstellen
if [ ! -f "config.json" ]; then
    echo "Creating enhanced config.json..."
    cat > config.json << 'EOF'
{
  "server": {
    "port": 8080,
    "host": "0.0.0.0",
    "httpsPort": 8443
  },
  "security": {
    "sessionSecret": "change-this-secret-key-in-production-min-32-chars",
    "jwtSecret": "change-this-jwt-secret-in-production-min-32-chars",
    "requireHttps": false,
    "enable2FA": false,
    "strongPasswords": true,
    "maxFailedAttempts": 5,
    "captchaThreshold": 3,
    "lockoutDuration": 900000,
    "sessionTimeout": 1800000,
    "defaultAdmin": {
      "username": "admin",
      "password": "admin123"
    },
    "rateLimiting": {
      "enabled": true,
      "windowMs": 900000,
      "maxLoginAttempts": 5,
      "maxApiRequests": 100,
      "maxCaptchaRequests": 10
    },
    "headers": {
      "hsts": true,
      "csp": true,
      "xssProtection": true,
      "noSniff": true,
      "frameOptions": "DENY"
    }
  },
  "ssl": {
    "domain": "localhost",
    "email": "admin@localhost",
    "method": "selfsigned",
    "autoRenewal": true,
    "keySize": 4096,
    "certValidity": 365,
    "setupOnStart": true
  },
  "backup": {
    "defaultPath": "./backups",
    "maxBackups": 10,
    "compression": true
  },
  "logging": {
    "level": "info",
    "file": "./logs/app.log",
    "security": {
      "enabled": true,
      "file": "./logs/security.log",
      "level": "warn"
    }
  },
  "updates": {
    "autoUpdate": true,
    "repository": "https://github.com/brandy2307/db-backup-tool.git",
    "branch": "main"
  },
  "gitBackup": {
    "enabled": false,
    "repository": "",
    "username": "",
    "branch": "main"
  }
}
EOF
fi

# SSL-Setup Script ausf√ºhrbar machen
if [ -f "ssl-setup.sh" ]; then
    chmod +x ssl-setup.sh
    echo "‚úÖ SSL-Setup Script ready"
else
    echo "‚ö†Ô∏è SSL-Setup Script not found - will be created at runtime"
fi

# Update-Script ausf√ºhrbar machen
if [ -f "update.sh" ]; then
    chmod +x update.sh
    echo "‚úÖ Update Script ready"
fi

# SSL Management Scripts ausf√ºhrbar machen
if [ -f "ssl-management.js" ]; then
    chmod 644 ssl-management.js
    echo "‚úÖ SSL Management ready"
fi

if [ -f "ssl-health-check.js" ]; then
    chmod 644 ssl-health-check.js
    echo "‚úÖ SSL Health Check ready"
fi

# Finale Berechtigungen setzen
chmod 755 .
chmod 644 *.json *.js *.md 2>/dev/null || true
chmod +x *.sh 2>/dev/null || true
chmod 755 backups logs config public ssl

# Package.json Verifikation
if node -e "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8'))" 2>/dev/null; then
    echo "‚úÖ package.json is valid"
else
    echo "‚ùå package.json is invalid"
    exit 1
fi

# Security Files Setup
touch logs/security.log
chmod 640 logs/security.log

# Schedules File Setup
if [ ! -f "backups/schedules.json" ]; then
    echo "[]" > backups/schedules.json
    chmod 644 backups/schedules.json
    echo "‚úÖ schedules.json created"
fi

# .gitattributes Setup
if [ ! -f ".gitattributes" ]; then
    echo "* text=auto" > .gitattributes
    chmod 644 .gitattributes
    echo "‚úÖ .gitattributes created"
fi

# Finale Verifikation
echo "================================================="
echo "INSTALLATION VERIFICATION"
echo "================================================="
echo "‚úÖ Repository: ${REPO_URL}"
echo "‚úÖ Branch: ${REPO_BRANCH}"
echo "‚úÖ Directory: $(pwd)"
echo "‚úÖ Node.js: $(node --version)"
echo "‚úÖ NPM: $(npm --version)"
echo "‚úÖ Package.json: Valid"
echo "‚úÖ SSL Support: Available"
echo "‚úÖ Security Features: 2FA, CAPTCHA, Rate Limiting"
echo "‚úÖ Database Tools: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB"
echo "‚úÖ Git Backup: Supported"
echo "‚úÖ Auto-Update: Enabled"
echo "================================================="

# Startup Test
echo "Performing startup test..."
if node -e "console.log('Node.js startup test OK')" 2>/dev/null; then
    echo "‚úÖ Node.js startup test passed"
else
    echo "‚ùå Node.js startup test failed"
    exit 1
fi

# Memory Test
echo "Testing memory usage..."
if node -e "console.log('Memory usage:', Math.round(process.memoryUsage().heapUsed / 1024 / 1024), 'MB')" 2>/dev/null; then
    echo "‚úÖ Memory test passed"
else
    echo "‚ùå Memory test failed"
    exit 1
fi

echo "================================================="
echo "üéâ INSTALLATION SUCCESSFUL! üéâ"
echo "================================================="
echo "Database Backup Tool (Enhanced Security) ready!"
echo "Features available:"
echo "  üîê HTTPS & SSL Certificate Management"
echo "  üõ°Ô∏è Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)"
echo "  ü§ñ CAPTCHA Protection"
echo "  üö´ Rate Limiting & Brute Force Protection"
echo "  üìä Session Management"
echo "  üîí Enhanced Security Headers"
echo "  üìã Audit Logging"
echo "  üì¶ Git Backup Integration"
echo "  üîÑ Automatic Updates"
echo "  üíæ Multi-Database Support"
echo "================================================="
echo "üîß Configure via Pterodactyl Panel Environment Variables"
echo "üöÄ Start server to begin secure backup operations"
echo "================================================="
